name: cookbook-club-lambdas
description: AWS Lambda to process cookbook-club data

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:compile && npm run build:install
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:zip
scripts.test: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha --recursive test/ -t 12000 && npm run test:coverage
scripts.build:compile: cp -R src dist/src && cp index.js dist
scripts.build:install: cp package.json dist && find dist -name package.json -execdir npm install --production \;
scripts.package:zip: cd dist && zip -r package.zip . && mv package.zip .. && cd ..
